name: Seven Step Snake
description:
You have been bitten by the dangerous and mythical seven step snake! According to legend, anyone bitten by this serpent will die after taking their seventh step! However, there is one cure, jam! Now you must leap your way through puzzles in search of this legendary cure.

Seven Step Snake is a small puzzle game with inspiration from the Chinese myth of the 5 step snake.  Push crates and leap over mushrooms in 15 unique levels all with the same goal: reach the jam in 7 steps or less!

This game was created for the 7th LMOB  Beginners Jam in 5 days

*the orange jam button is the play button!

--Credits--

Music Soundtracks and Art by Eric Xu

Coding by Daxton Lee

Game and Level Design by Daxton Lee and Eric Xu
